# every

> Tests whether every element in an array-like object is truthy.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var every = require( '@stdlib/assert/every' );
```

#### every( arr )

Tests whether every element in an **array-like object** is truthy.

```javascript
var arr = [ 1, 1, 2, 3 ];

var b = every( arr );
// returns true

arr = [ 1, 1, 0, 1 ];

b = every( arr );
// returns false
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

<section class="examples">

## Examples

<!-- eslint no-undef: "error" -->

```javascript
var every = require( '@stdlib/assert/every' );

var arr;
var b;

arr = [ 1, 1, 2, 3 ];
b = every( arr );
// returns true

arr = [ 1, 1, 0, 1 ];
b = every( arr );
// returns false
```

</section>

<!-- /.examples -->
